summary: Arachnids are a group of arthropods that include spiders, scorpions, and ticks. They have eight legs and are mostly found on land, but some live in water. There are over 110,000 known species, with spiders making up more than half of them. The name comes from the Greek word for spider, inspired by a myth about a human weaver turned into a spider.
title: Arachnid
